subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tavares’s 16th and 17th goals of the season helped the Islanders defeat the Flames, 2-1, and keep pace with the Penguins atop the Metropolitan Division.
snippet: Tavares’s 16th and 17th goals of the season helped the Islanders defeat the Flames, 2-1, and keep pace with the Penguins atop the Metropolitan Division.
